price: Na ndugu zao wanawavutia kwenye upotofu, kisha wao hawaachi.
arabic: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ
footnotes: Na ndugu zao mashetani, nao ni hao makafiri, mashetani huwazidisha upotovu kwa kuwajaza wasiwasi. Tena hawa makafiri hawaachi upotovu wao wakazingatia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'wānuhum yamuddūnahum fī al-ghayi thumma lā yuq'ṣirūna
